nodes.text: Flayshil Crena was a renowned philosopher who surmised that there existed a finite amount of luck in the galaxy, and that it should be rationed. Around 13 BBY, after experiencing some luck, the young Rodian Tsuulo contemplated Crena's words and explained the philosopher's teachings to the humans Han and Qi'ra, who were disinterested. Tsuulo later recounted another of Crena's sayings, when he told Han and Qi'ra that Creana had also said that which you seek hardest to find remains hidden the longest, before explaining he had no idea what it meant.
Flayshil Crena was first mentioned in the canon young adult novel Most Wanted, which was written by Rae Carson and published in 2018 alongside the film Solo: A Star Wars Story.
